extendedInfo.description: This simple yet useful widget shows you when your next alarm will ring including snooze alarm. It refreshes by itself every hour but can be refreshed simply by tapping on the widget. Every refresh changes the color of the text.Features:- Resizable- Can be added to lock screenEasy IT Is.In case of any issues please contact us directly by e-mail.

reviews.title: Great new look.
reviews.comment: Love the new and setup.  Great app.
reviews.author: LONNIE RAMSEY

reviews.title: Slow to update
reviews.comment: Takes ages to update after changing the alarm on the Ace 2. Other similar apps are faster at recognising the changes to the next alarm time
reviews.author: Roger Hardiman

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I have to admit I\'m kind of OCD, and in the interest of not missing work the next morning, I used to double check my alarm clock 3 or 4 times before bed each night.  This makes it super easy to verify the alarm is set - I put the widget next to my clock and done.  I have not had the issue of it updating slowly like some people are mentioning, but to them I would say:  Why would you change an alarm, then go to your home screen and stare at the widget and wait for it to update?  Just tap it, and in 0.05 seconds you know it\'s up to date and you don\'t have to guess or hope.
reviews.author: Dave Everett

reviews.title: Simple and effective.
reviews.comment: I just wanted a no frills app that only displayed the next alarm for my lock screen. Needless to say this served the purpose!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: You can do transparent background/select that obsion.
reviews.author: Razvan Persa

reviews.title: click.
reviews.comment: would be useful to open the alarm/clock app on click.  the widget design is not tally nice .
reviews.author: A Google User
